plot: A man with many disguises uses robotic beetles, man-made monsters and other devices to try and steal atomic power.
title: Shonen tanteidan: Kabutomushi no yoki
plot_es: A man with many disguises uses robotic beetles, man-made monsters and other devices to try and steal atomic power.
plot_en: A man with many disguises uses robotic beetles, man-made monsters and other devices to try and steal atomic power.
